title: Chinese (1900) Min Zhong Genesis Portion
title_vernacular: 中文 (1900) 闽中创世记部分
description: Chinese translation of the first four chapters of Genesis published in 1900 by the British and Foreign Bible Society. This portion of scripture is not written in traditional Chinese script but rather in phonetic lettering. Standard Chinese, known in China as Putonghua, based on the Mandarin dialect of Beijing, is the official national spoken language for the Chinese mainland and Taiwan.

language.name: Min Zhong Chinese
language.area: Central Fujian Province, Sha County, Yong’an and Sanming municipalities.
